p: Research is already underway to create a vaccine to protect against SARS-CoV-2. Taking advantage of the similarities in structure between SARS-CoV (responsible for the 2003 SARS epidemic) and SARS-CoV-2 (responsible for COVID-19), studies have mapped several epitopes to be targeted for a potential vaccine ( 86, 87). WHO estimates an approximately 18-month timeframe for COVID-19 vaccine availability.
